text: Alan Stewart got in touch with Brady
and said, seeing how it is all the rage
on the internet we should also join in
and do the Dice Bucket Challenge.
Wow, okay, so now that I have felt the
pain of a lack of water, here at StandUp
Maths enterprises, we're going to give one
pound for every pi dice that just got
dumped on me to Water Aid and we
challenge everyone else in the world to
give some money to Water Aid. And so that
is the Dice Bucket Challenge - hey look I
rolled a Yahtzee! Hey, fantastic, what are
